name: Resident Evil 0 / biohazard 0 HD REMASTER
content:
files:
- codecs: https://lutris.net/files/tools/windowsmedia-kb942423-x86-intl.exe
game:
  appid: 339340
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: wmp10
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Windows Media Player 10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win32
    description: Installing DirectX components
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing DirectX components
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: xact_jun2010
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Xact
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /q
    description: Installing video codecs
    executable: codecs
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  xboxdrv: --trigger-as-button
